V03vinv14_u:5: tataḥ śāstrāṇi vigarhitvā saṃghena pṛṣṭaḥ poṣadhaḥ //
V03vinv14_u:7: tac ca poṣadhasūtraṃ madhyamāgame saṃgītanipāte paṭhyate //
V03vinv14_u:11: uktaṃ bhagavatā saṃghasthavireṇa tv ardhamāsaṃ prātimokṣasūtroddeśa uddeṣṭavya iti /
V03vinv14_u:15: āyuṣman na (312r1 = GBM 6.936) śuddhā tāvad bhikṣuparṣat* /
V03vinv14_u:21: yatra bhikṣavo divyena cakṣuṣā dṛṣṭvā codayanti smārayanti /
V03vinv14_u:22: ity etat prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bhagavata ārocayanti /
V03vinv14_u:25: tasmān na bhikṣuṇā divyena cakṣuṣā dṛṣṭvā bhikṣuś codayitavyaḥ smārayitavyaḥ /
V03vinv14_u:26: bhikṣur divyena cakṣuṣā dṛṣṭvā bhikṣuṃ codayati smārayati sātisāro bhavati /
V03vinv14_u:27: yathā divyena cakṣuṣā evaṃ divyena śrotreṇa /
V03vinv14_u:28: punar apy asāv upadhivārikaḥ saṃghasthavirasya purastāt sthitvā kathayati /
V03vinv14_u:34: sthavira katham nāma tvayā saṃghamadhye mama śirasi muṣṭir nipātitā /
V03vinv14_u:35: aho batāhaṃ tvayā ekānte coditaḥ syām iti /
V03vinv14_u:40: saced ekānte codyamāno na smarati smārayitavyaḥ /
V03vinv14_u:62: amūlakena kṛtena poṣadhaṃ sthāpayati adhārmikaṃ poṣadhasthāpanam* /
V03vinv14_u:64: samūlakena kṛtena (MSV III 109) poṣadhaṃ sthāpayati dhārmikaṃ poṣadhasthāpanam* /
V03vinv14_u:65: idam ekam adhārmikaṃ poṣadhasthāpanam ekaṃ dhārmikam* /

V03vinv14_u:70: ime dve adhārmike poṣadhasthāpane dve dhārmike /
V03vinv14_u:73: amūlakena kṛtena amūlakenākṛtena amūlakena kṛtākṛtena poṣadhaṃ sthāpayati adhārmikaṃ poṣadhasthāpanam* /
V03vinv14_u:74: samūlakena kṛtena samūlakenākṛtena samūlakena kṛtākṛtena poṣadhaṃ sthāpayati dhārmikaṃ poṣadhasthāpanam* /
V03vinv14_u:75: imāni trīṇy adhārmikāṇi poṣadhasthāpanāni trīṇi dhārmikāṇi /
V03vinv14_u:78: amūlikayā śīlavipattyā dṛṣṭivipattyā ācāravipattyā ājīvavipattyā poṣadhaṃ sthāpayaty adhārmikaṃ poṣadhasthāpanam* /
V03vinv14_u:80: samūlikayā śīlavipattyā dṛṣṭivipattyā ācāravipattyā ājīvavipattyā poṣadhaṃ sthāpayati dhārmikaṃ poṣadhasthāpanam* /
V03vinv14_u:81: imāni catvāry adhārmikāṇi poṣadhasthāpanāni catvāri dhārmikāṇi /
V03vinv14_u:84: amūlikayā pārājikayā saṃghāvaśeṣayā pāyantikayā pratideśanikayā duṣkṛtayā poṣadhaṃ sthāpayaty adhārmikaṃ poṣadhasthāpanam* /
V03vinv14_u:86: samūlikayā pārājikayā saṃghāvaśeṣayā pāyantikayā pratideśanikayā duṣkṛtayā poṣadhaṃ sthāpayati dhārmikaṃ poṣadhasthāpanam* /
V03vinv14_u:88: ṣaḍ adhārmikāṇi poṣadhasthāpanāni ṣaḍ dhārmikāṇi poṣadhasthāpanāni /
V03vinv14_u:91: amūlakena kṛtena sāvaśeṣeṇa amūlakenākṛtena sāvaśeṣeṇa amūlakena kṛtākṛtena sāvaśeṣeṇa poṣadhaṃ sthāpayaty adhārmikaṃ poṣadhasthāpanam* /
V03vinv14_u:93: samūlakena kṛtena sāvaśeṣeṇa samūlakenākṛtena sāvaśeṣeṇa samūlakena kṛtākṛtena sāvaśeṣeṇa poṣadhaṃ sthāpayati dhārmikaṃ poṣadhasthāpanam* /
V03vinv14_u:94: imāni ṣaḍ adhārmikāṇi poṣadhasthāpanāni ṣaḍ dhārmikāṇi /
V03vinv14_u:97: amūlikayā śīlavipattyā dṛṣṭivipattyā ācāravipattyā ājīvavipattyā amūlakena dṛṣṭena śrutena pariśaṃkitena poṣadhaṃ sthāpayaty adhārmikaṃ poṣadhasthāpanam* /
V03vinv14_u:98: samūlakikayā śīlavipattyā dṛṣṭivipattyā ācāravipattyā ājīvavipattyā samūlakena dṛṣṭena śrutena pariśaṃkitena poṣadhaṃ sthāpayati dhārmikaṃ poṣadhasthāpanam* /
V03vinv14_u:103: pratideśanikayā duṣkṛtayā amūlakena dṛṣṭena śrutena pariśaṃkitena poṣadhaṃ sthāpayaty adhārmikaṃ poṣadhasthāpanam* /
V03vinv14_u:104: samūlikayā pārājikayā saṃghāvaśeṣayā pāyantikayā pratideśanikayā duṣkṛtayā samūlakena dṛṣṭena śrutena pariśaṃkitena poṣadhaṃ sthāpayati dhārmikaṃ poṣadhasthāpanam* /
V03vinv14_u:105: imāni aṣṭāv adhārmikāṇi poṣadhasthāpanāni aṣṭau dhārmikāṇi /
V03vinv14_u:109: amūlakena kṛtena sāvaśeṣeṇa amūlakenākṛtena sāvaśeṣeṇa amūlakena kṛtākṛtena sāvaśeṣeṇa /
V03vinv14_u:110: amūlakena kṛtena niravaśeṣeṇa amūlakenākṛtena niravaśeṣeṇa amūlakena kṛtākṛtena niravaśeṣeṇa poṣadhaṃ sthāpayaty adhārmikaṃ poṣadhasthāpanam* /
V03vinv14_u:112: samūlakena kṛtena sāvaśeṣeṇa samūlakenākṛtena sāvaśeṣeṇa samūlakena kṛtākṛtena sāvaśeṣeṇa /
V03vinv14_u:113: samūlakena kṛtena niravaśeṣeṇa samūlakenākṛtena niravaśeṣeṇa samūlakena kṛtākṛtena niravaśeṣeṇa poṣadhaṃ sthāpayati (313r1 = GBM 6.938)
V03vinv14_u:121: śikṣāpratyākhyānakathā na (MSV III 112) na viprakṛtā bhavati /
V03vinv14_u:124: śīlavipanno na bhavati na dṛṣṭivipanno nācāravipanno nājīvavipannaḥ /
V03vinv14_u:126: yair ākārair yair liṅgair yair nimittaiḥ pārājikām āpattim āpadyate taṃ ca bhikṣuḥ paśyati na tair ākārair na tair liṅgair na tair nimittaiḥ pārājikām āpattim āpadyamānam* /
V03vinv14_u:127: sa cādṛṣṭvā aśrutvā apariśaṃkya poṣadhaṃ sthāpayati /
V03vinv14_u:131: yathāpi tat saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ saṃniṣaṇṇā bhavanti saṃnipatitāḥ /
V03vinv14_u:132: sā ca kathā na lajjā bhavati na tanmayā na viprakṛtā /
V03vinv14_u:133: te ca bhikṣavaḥ utthāyāsanebhyo nānā viprakrāmanti /
V03vinv14_u:134: sa cādṛṣṭvā aśrutvā apariśaṃkya ca poṣadhaṃ sthāpayati /
V03vinv14_u:138: yair ākārair yair liṅgair yair nimittaiḥ śikṣāpratyākhyānaṃ kriyate taṃ ca bhikṣuḥ paśyati na tair ākārair na tair liṅgair na tair nimittaiḥ śikṣāpratyākhyānaṃ kurvāṇam* /
V03vinv14_u:139: sa cādṛṣṭvā aśrutvā apariśaṃkya poṣadhaṃ sthāpayati /
V03vinv14_u:143: yathāpi tat saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ saṃniṣaṇṇā bhavanti saṃnipatitāḥ /
V03vinv14_u:144: sā ca kathā na lajjā bhavati na tanmayā na viprakṛtā bhavati /
V03vinv14_u:145: (MSV III 113) te ca bhikṣavaḥ utthāyāsanebhyo nānā viprakrāmanti /
V03vinv14_u:146: sa cādṛṣṭvā aśrutvā apariśaṃkya poṣadhaṃ sthāpayati /
V03vinv14_u:150: yair ākārair yair liṅgair yair nimittaiḥ saṃghaḥ pratyākhyāyate taṃ ca bhikṣuḥ paśyati na tair ākārair na tair liṅgair na tair nimittaiḥ saṃghapratyākhyānaṃ kurvantam* /
V03vinv14_u:151: sa cādṛṣṭvā aśrutvā apariśaṃkya poṣadhaṃ sthāpayati /
V03vinv14_u:153: evaṃ saṃgho na pratyākhyāto na bhavati /
V03vinv14_u:155: yathāpi tat saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ saṃniṣaṇṇā bhavanti saṃnipatitāḥ /
V03vinv14_u:156: sā ca kathā na lajjā bhavati na tanmayā na viprakṛtā bhavati /
V03vinv14_u:157: te ca bhikṣavaḥ utthāyāsanebhyo nānā viprakrāmanti /
V03vinv14_u:158: sa cādṛṣṭvā aśrutvā apariśaṃkya poṣadhaṃ sthāpayati /
V03vinv14_u:162: caturṇāṃ pārājikānām anyatamānyatamām āpattim āpanno bhavati /
V03vinv14_u:163: tasya ca bhikṣur adṛṣṭvā aśrutvā apariśaṃkya poṣadhaṃ sthāpayati /
V03vinv14_u:167: dvāṣaṣṭer dṛṣṭigatānām anyatarānyatarāṃ dṛṣṭim anabhiniviṣṭo bhavati /
V03vinv14_u:168: tasya ca bhikṣur adṛṣṭvā aśrutvā apariśaṃkya poṣadhaṃ sthāpayati /

V03vinv14_u:192: sa dṛṣṭvā śrutvā pariśaṃkya poṣadhaṃ sthāpayati /

V03vinv14_u:251: alajjisaṃghaḥ eḍamūkasaṃghaḥ gaṇasaṃghaḥ saṃvṛtisaṃghaḥ paramārthasaṃghaś ca /
V03vinv14_u:255: yatra na sūtradharo na vinayadharo na mātṛkādharaḥ /
V03vinv14_u:262: tatra ye pūrvakās trayaḥ saṃghāḥ alajjinaḥ saṃghaḥ eḍamūkasaṃghaḥ gaṇasaṃghaś ca labhyam ebhir adharmeṇa karmaṇā kartum* /
V03vinv14_u:263: yo 'yaṃ saṃvṛtisaṃgho labhyam anena dharmasaṃjñinā adharmeṇa karmaṇā kartum* /
V03vinv14_u:264: yas tv ayaṃ paramārthasaṃgho na labhyam anenādharmeṇa karmaṇā kartum* /
